name: Pension Edorta

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Edorta for one night in October 2006 and we booked a room with shared bathroom facilties for 40 euros. The management was gracious and friendly and kindly agreed to let us leave our luggage until our room was ready. The room was immaculately clean with a comfortable bed, fresh linens, and an adorable balcony looking out onto a charming street in the Parte Vieja, very close to the beach, the hills, a 31 calle de agosto, the main strip for tapas-hopping. There were several excellent bakeries close-by as well as a convenient internet cafe a few blocks from the pension. The bathroom was clean and enormous and very close to the room. The fire alarm unfortunately malfunctioned and went off while we were having an afternoon nap - and as a result, the manager discounted our room to 30 euros, which we thought was very classy. An excellent find and I would recommend it to anyone.
reviews.title: Great value and location with friendly management

reviews.text: Great little pension in the middle of the old town in San Sebastian.
reviews.title: Great location
Really great location, and accomodation.
reviews.text: Our room (large) had a bathroom (large) and was very tastefully decorated.

reviews.title: Nicely decorated, great location
reviews.text: It was also clean and the staff were extremely friendly.

aka: Pension Edorta Hotel San Sebastian - Donostia
